pr_title: add scheduling constraint for kube nodes

timeline.message: add scheduling constraint for kube nodes instead of trying to do lease management when conditions and taints change

timeline.bodyText: Do we depend on GC process here to do the cleanup?
timeline.author: tbak

timeline.bodyText: What if node is not there? We should check for null at least + double check that an exception is not thrown if a node is missing or due to other problems.
timeline.author: tbak
